name: Google Chrome
info: “A fast new browser from Google. Try it now!”

name: Mozilla Firefox
info: “Your online security is Firefox's top priority. Firefox is free, and made to help you get the most out of the web.”

name: Safari
info: “Safari for Mac and Windows from Apple, the world’s most innovative browser.”

name: Opera
info: “The fastest browser on Earth—secure, powerful and easy to use, with excellent privacy protection. And it is free.”

name: Internet Explorer
info: “Designed to help you take control of your privacy and browse with confidence. Free from Microsoft.”
